retry: If Sonolus did not open, click the following link to try again:
download: If you do not have Sonolus yet, download it here:
loginSubtitle: Do not use code by other people!
loginTipStep1: 1. Register the login server {{server.auth.url}} to Sonolus.
loginTipStep2: 2. Enter the code {{login.code}} in the login server.
loginTipAlternative: Alternatively, if Sonolus was installed on this device, you can login by pressing Open in Sonolus button above.
